lead_paragraph: New York Yankees reliever Aroldis Chapman has been suspended 30 games for his alleged role in a domestic violence incident involving his girlfriend, Major League Baseball said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Yankees' Chapman Banned 30 Games for Domestic Dispute
headline.main: Yankees' Chapman Banned 30 Games for Domestic Dispute

snippet: New York Yankees reliever Aroldis Chapman has been suspended 30 games for his alleged role in a domestic violence incident involving his girlfriend, Major League Baseball said on Tuesday....
